DOC.brief_summary: The goal propose study apply experimental economics online grocery store shopping model examine effect price hypothetical food purchase
DOC.brief_title: Price Changes Hypothetical Food Purchases Adult Grocery Shoppers
DOC.detailed_description: Participants lean overweight primary grocery shopper age 18 year old . Participants consider lean body mass index ( BMI = kg/m2 ) less 29.9 , overweight BMI great equal 30.12 To meet eligibility study , participant must guardian child least 2 year old , primary grocery shopping family , must also report weekly household grocery shopper , purchase majority household 's grocery week .
DOC.criteria: 18 old primary shopper household , least one child 2 year age eat disorder , like study food
